meanings.definition: Covered in an excessive amount of suds.
meanings.sent1: The car was oversudsed after the kids had a playful soap fight.
meanings.sent2: The oversudsed laundry machine made a mess on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The oversudsed puppy looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was so high, she felt oversudsed with joy.
meanings.sent5: The oversudsed dishes sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To have too many suds present.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally oversudsed the sink while doing the dishes.
meanings.sent2: She oversudsed the bathtub, causing bubbles to overflow.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they oversudsed the water during bath time.
meanings.sent4: The washing machine oversudsed, creating a soapy mess.
meanings.sent5: He oversudsed the glass, making it difficult to see through.
